title: Australia Day recognition for Dea Brown

body.content:
Shire of Campaspe Award winners

The winners of the 2022 Campaspe Shire Australia Day Awards were announced at celebrations across the district..

Shire awards were presented in three categories, as follows:

· Citizen of the Year: Mitchell Bull of Kyabram

· Young Citizen of the Year: Dimity Pearson of Rochester

· Community Group of the Year: Wirima in Rotary Park Committee (Rochester)

Mayor Cr Chrissy Weller congratulated the winners for their exceptional contribution to their communities, in their own individual ways.

“It is fantastic to see community spirit alive and well across the shire,” Mayor Weller said.
